title: Crash bandicoot kindred and spyro aurelion? =D
body:
random thought and i know itd have to be a reference more than a copy paste of the names (like king rammus etc) but lets have a crash bandicoot styled kindred, lamb is bandicoot colored and wolf is the mask, while in her ult the masks feathers change to the red/gold feathers=P

as for aurelion give him purple skin and have his stars being 3 dragonflies.

that is all =)

replies.body: I think it is a nice idea^^ I would love a Spyro like skin for {{champion:136}}  (dark flame {{champion:102}}  would be cynder then :3) the thing with the dragonflys is brilliant in my opinion and his ult should be that huge purple laser of the convexity element (or how it was called^^') and maybe that you could change the colour of his Q, like choosing one element or it just switches through them
LOL just... Wow you couldn't have made them dumber ðŸ˜†
that what they said to your mum after you came out of the womb? =P
